reporter_caption.center: TOWN OF NARRAGANSETT v. PAPPAS, 121 R.I. 925 (1978)

caption.center: TOWN OF NARRAGANSETT v. MARCOS J. PAPPAS et al.

opinion.posture:
This matter came on to be heard on a show cause order issued by this court on October 26, 1978.
No cause having been shown by the parties, the appeal in the above-entitled matter is dismissed.
opinion.attorneys:
James O. Watts, for plaintiff.
Edward J. Regan, for defendants.
